item.title: Static site generators part 2 - Hugo
item.description: Compared to last post about Jekyll I wanted to take a static site a bit further and build my own personal website (this one) so the requirements I had were a bit more defined this time (well, in reality still just in my own head, but anyways). Hoping that I will spend some time on this website as well as ENJOY spending time on it I wanted something: Easy and fun to work with Responsible UI out of the box Site needs to look the way I want (without me having to put a lot of effort on it) Cheap or free Easy to extend in future Ideally something hip and popular, lets face it.
